name: Asante
0:
”Alexa, ask Asante to open the garage door.”
”Alexa, ask Asante to open the garage door two.”
”Alexa, ask Asante to check if the garage door is closed.”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: asante
Developer Terms of Use
des:
To enable this skill, an Asante GarageViewer and at least one Door Sensor is required.

This skill can support up to 2 garage doors per device. You can ask Alexa to open, close or check the status of your garage doors.

To get started:
- Select the Enable Skill button.
- Link your Asante 2.0 Account to give the skill permission to access your garage door.
- Once your Asante 2.0 and Amazon Alexa accounts are linked together, you can start using Alexa. Example: "Ask Asante to open my door one".

For support or account linking information, please contact our support team. (support@asante.com)
